sentence.idiomatic: This is a complete misunderstanding, you must listen to my explanation.
I didn't mean that, by all means, don't misunderstand me.
You've misunderstood us--we are just friends.
They just finished arguing and have already made up.
After hearing his explanation, I have decided to reconcile with him.
They have already broken up for good--reconciliation is impossible.
I didn't steal anything. I have been wronged.
You have really wronged him. He came back so late because he went to buy you a gift.
I'm sorry, I have done you wrong--it's all because I'm too short-tempered.
His excuse for being late is the same every time--a traffic jam.
If you feel bored, just make up an excuse to leave early.
Working overtime is just an excuse. The truth is, you just want to be alone with her.
You're really capable. You were able to solve such a difficult problem so easily.
He doesn't have any of his own abilities, his becoming director can all be attributed to his wife.
If a man is not at all accomplished, what woman would be willing to marry him?
She gave birth to a cute set of twins. Everyone is so jealous.
That he could manage to get such a beautiful wife, what man wouldn't be jealous of him?
When I was young I was particularly jealous of those schoolmates who had good grades. They were always being praised by the teacher.
His campaign slogan is: "Wholeheartedly Serve the People."
I will love you with all my heart and soul, please marry me.
As long as you do a thing wholeheartedly, you will definitely do it well.
You are really useless--that a grown man could actually be toyed with by a girl.
He already has a wife. He is definitely with you just to play around.
You absolutely cannot fall in love with him. There's no saying how many women's emotions he has toyed with before.
Lili, I'm really sorry about last time in the bar.
Forget about it. It's so minor; I didn't think it was a big deal. If you want to say something, just go ahead and say it.
I think our break-up was all a misunderstanding. Let's make up!
Zhang Liang, I think we should just be friends.
Is it Liu Xiang? He's not right for you. He can't possibly truly love you.
What right do you have to say that? You think all men are like you?
And what am I like? Come out and say it.
You know what happened between you and Feifei.
Nothing happened between us. You're purposely wrongfully accusing me! This way you have an excuse to break up and get with the rich guy.
Liu Xiang is more accomplished than you, and richer. What are you good at, besides being jealous?
All right, I've had enough! I was totally devoted to you, but you just toy with my emotions. I can finally see it clearly. We are really through.
We already broke up! Please don't contact me again.

word.literal: there are plenty of fish in the sea
